April 17, 1949 D Queensland State Brass Band Championship (B Grade)
Queensland State Brass Band Championship (B Grade) 20 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Queensland State Brass Band Championship queensland-state-brass-band-championship-b-grade
Australia
B Grade
Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest
Ipswich Queensland Australia NEW RULE--- This is the first time in which the new rule applying to a championship band operated. The championship shield now goes to the band gaining the greatest number of points in music & drill instead of the band winning the aggregate in selections only (Cairns newspaper 14/04/1949)
Marching events = Street / Oval / Diagram points listed under Stage March
Sept. 19, 2018, 10:30 p.m. March 19, 2019, 4:37 a.m.
